sentences.en: A hard-money advocate, suspicious of personal debt, Jackson viewed the Bank as a monstrosity that gave power over the people's money to a few unelected private bankers.
sentences.cn: 作为一个珍惜血汗钱、怀疑个人借债的倡导者，杰克逊视银行为少数未经选举的私人银行家支配人民财富的畸形产物。

sentences.en: A monstrosity too horrible to behold!
Her flower arrangement was a monstrosity.
sentences.cn: 她插的花真是难看死了.

sentences.en: London is grandest and most complex monstrosity on earth.
sentences.cn: 伦敦是世界上最庞大最复杂的怪物.

sentences.en: Near relative wedding was still one of the main reasons tance disease and congenital monstrosity infants.
sentences.cn: 近亲婚配家族生育子女仍是出现遗传病和先天畸形儿的主要原因之一.

sentences.en: Phil: Goodness gracious! Who thought monstrosity?
sentences.cn: 菲尔 ︰ 我的天啊! 是谁想出那种可怕的东西啊?

sentences.en: Pompidou was in fact saddling us with a procedural monstrosity.
sentences.cn: 蓬皮杜实际在用程序问题吓唬我们.

sentences.en: That new multi - storey car - park is an utter monstrosity!
sentences.cn: 那座新建的多层停车场难看极了!

sentences.en: They regarded the atom bomb as a monstrosity.
sentences.cn: 他们把原子弹视为怪物.

words.tran_cn: 巨大的；怪异的；荒谬的；畸形的
